oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Tennessee Facts for Home Seekers
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Pamphlets; Agriculture
Agriculture
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Ten-page pamphlet isuued by the Tennessee Department of Agriculture with the purpose of encouraging emigration to the state by focusing on the agricultural advantages of Tennessee.
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Tennessee Department of Agriculture
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: This promotional pamphlet was no doubt issued as a response to the dire economic consequences resulting from the agricultural depression of the 1890s and the urban migration to the North.
